div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Linkage` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Linkage`. Element `Linkage` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.author`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.item` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.type`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.resource`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 Resource `Linkage` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Linkage`. Element `Linkage` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.type`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.resource`, but has no comparisons.
